com.ashwin.fri.pacman.display

Class AnimatedSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.display.Sprite
      • com.ashwin.fri.pacman.display.AnimatedSprite

  • public class AnimatedSprite
extends Sprite
    Animated sprites are associated with actors and have additional properties that allow them to be animated and oriented.
    Author:
    ashwin

    • Method Detail

      • nextFrame

        public AnimatedSprite nextFrame(Actor.Orientation dir)
        Move to the next frame of the animation. This method increments the counter and sets the index of the sprite to the proper value.
